title: LinkedIn has a fake account problem it's trying to fix. Real users are part of the solution
description: Between January 1 and June 30, more than 21 million fake accounts were detected and removed from LinkedIn, according to the company's community report.

title: Should you buy a gift for your boss and co-workers for the holidays? HR experts weigh in
description: There are three rules you should follow when it comes to gift giving at work, according to HR executives.

title: Billionaire investor Charlie Munger: ‘The world is not driven by greed, it’s driven by envy’
description: The 98-year-old billionaire says he's 'conquered envy.' In the past, he's said that's a secret to a long and happy life.

title: How the four-day workweek gained momentum — and could change the future of work
description: A four-day or shorter workweek is gaining momentum worldwide — a big thanks to the pandemic.

title: Crypto.com CEO has history of red flags including bankruptcy and quick exits
description: Before Crypto.com, Kris Marszalek left behind a trail of personal bankruptcy, offshore payments, and a corporate collapse that separated users from their funds.

title: China, Saudi Arabia stress importance of oil market stability as Xi visits Riyadh
description: China and Saudi Arabia stressed the importance of oil market stability during President Xi Jinping's three-day visit to the Mideast Gulf kingdom.

title: Bahamas attorneys file emergency motion in FTX case for access to databases with client information
description: Lawyers for Bahamian regulators asked a judge in Delaware bankruptcy court to allow them access to FTX data so they can locate assets and information.

title: CNBC Stock World Cup 2022: Recap of winners and losers so far
description: If you invest today, which of the two companies going head to head will give you a greater total return over the next 12 months? We ask experts.

title: Judge does not hold Trump office in contempt of court despite DOJ request
description: Donald Trump, who is again running for the White House, is under criminal investigation for the removal of government documents when his presidency ended.
